sentences.en: A snack in the afternoon bridges the gap between lunch and supper.
sentences.cn: 在午餐和晚餐之间,下午吃些点心补充一下.

sentences.en: Drinks and light snacks are served at the bar.
sentences.cn: 酒吧里供应饮料和小吃。

sentences.en: He converted his truck into a mobile snack bar.
sentences.cn: 他把货车改成流动小吃店.

sentences.en: I have my lunch in a snack bar nearby.
sentences.cn: 我在附近一家快餐店吃午饭.

sentences.en: I only have a snack at lunch time.
sentences.cn: 午饭我通常只吃一份快餐.

sentences.en: I'm not very hungry a small snack is fine for me.
sentences.cn: 我不太饿--来点小吃就够了.

sentences.en: It won't take me more than five minutes to knock a snack together.
sentences.cn: 用不了五分钟,我就能做好一份点心.

sentences.en: Kiwi fruit are just the thing for a healthy snack.
sentences.cn: 猕猴桃正是健康的小点心。

sentences.en: Let's have a snack at the nearest restaurant.
sentences.cn: 咱们找个近便的饭馆吃点吧.

sentences.en: Lunch was a snack in the fields.
sentences.cn: 午饭是在野外吃的便餐。

sentences.en: She whistled up an excellent snack for us all.
sentences.cn: 她很快地为我们大家弄出一顿很不错的便饭.

sentences.en: Snack Bar is the place where fast - food service is available.
sentences.cn: 快餐部是供应快餐的地方.

sentences.en: snack foods like crisps and peanuts
sentences.cn: 炸薯片和花生之类的小吃

sentences.en: The snack bar is open during the day.
Waiters and waitresses work in restaurants, hotels, cafe and snack bars.
sentences.cn: 男女服务员在餐馆, 旅馆, 咖啡馆,快餐馆里招待顾客.

sentences.en: You are better eating just a small snack than hurrying a main meal.
sentences.cn: 你最好简单吃点快餐，不要着急着慌地吃正餐。

sentences.en: You can enjoy a quick snack while your children cavort in the sand.
sentences.cn: 趁孩子们在沙滩上嬉戏，你可以吃点小吃。

trans.tran_en: a small amount of food that is eaten between main meals or instead of a meal
to eat small amounts of food between main meals or instead of a meal
